name: HKStockAgent
description: Hong Kong stock market trading and analysis agent specialized in HK stock price monitoring, technical analysis, paper trading simulation, and portfolio management with HK market-specific features.

skills.name: HK Stock Price Lookup
skills.description: Get real-time stock prices for Hong Kong stocks by stock code.
examples: What's the current price of Tencent (00700)?
Show me the price of Alibaba 09988
How much is China Mobile 00941 trading at?

skills.name: Technical Analysis
skills.description: Analyze HK stocks with technical indicators (MA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands) and generate trading signals with confidence levels.
examples: Analyze Tencent 00700's technical indicators
Give me trading signals for 09988
What are the technical indicators for 00941?

skills.name: Buy HK Stocks (Paper Trading)
skills.description: Execute simulated buy orders for Hong Kong stocks with lot-based trading. Supports proper lot sizing and HK market fees calculation.
examples: Buy 1 lot of Tencent 00700
Execute buy order for 2 lots of Alibaba 09988
Purchase 1 lot of China Mobile

skills.name: Sell HK Stocks (Paper Trading)
skills.description: Execute simulated sell orders for Hong Kong stocks. Requires existing position in the portfolio.
examples: Sell 1 lot of Tencent 00700
Execute sell order for my Alibaba position
Close my position in 00941

skills.name: Portfolio Management
skills.description: View current HK stock portfolio including all positions, cash balance, total assets, and P&L calculations.
examples: Show me my HK stock portfolio
What's my current portfolio status?
Display all my HK stock positions and P&L

skills.name: HK Stock Search
skills.description: Search for Hong Kong stocks by company name, stock code, or keywords to find matching stocks.
examples: Search for Hong Kong bank stocks
Find stocks related to technology in HK
Search for Tencent stock code

skills.name: AH Premium Analysis
skills.description: Monitor and analyze A-H stock premium/discount for dual-listed companies between mainland A-shares and Hong Kong H-shares.
examples: What's the AH premium for China Construction Bank?
Show me AH stock premium for dual-listed stocks
Analyze A-H price difference for 00939

skills.name: HK Connect Capital Flow
skills.description: Track Hong Kong Connect (Southbound) capital flows from mainland China into Hong Kong stocks.
examples: What's the recent HK Connect capital flow?
Show me southbound capital flow trend
How much mainland money is flowing into HK stocks?

metadata.author: StockBuddy Team
metadata.notes: Paper trading mode only - no real money involved. Supports HK market-specific features including lot size handling, market fees, AH premium, and HK Connect flow monitoring.
